trans-unit.source: Specifies how many times an instance of a template can be created.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以创建模板的实例的次数。

trans-unit.source: The TemplateInstance enumeration specifies values indicating the number of times an instance of a template can be created.
trans-unit.target: TemplateInstance 枚举指定值，用于指示可以创建模板的实例的次数。

trans-unit.source: The ttribute class uses values from the TemplateInstance enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Ttribute 类使用 TemplateInstance 枚举中的值。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the ttribute.Single and ttribute.Multiple fields specify single and multiple instances of a template, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，ttribute。Single 和 ttribute。多个字段分别指定模板的单个和多个实例。

trans-unit.source: A single instance of a template allows you to reference controls that are contained within the template.
trans-unit.target: 模板的单个实例，可引用模板中包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: Examples of controls that use the Single value in property metadata include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone.ZoneTemplate%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.ZoneTemplate%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone.ZoneTemplate%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的属性元数据的单个值的控件的示例包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone.ZoneTemplate%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>控件、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.ZoneTemplate%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone.ZoneTemplate%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone.ZoneTemplate%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.ZoneTemplate%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>的属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone.ZoneTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A template that is instantiated multiple times.
A template that is instantiated only one time.
trans-unit.target: 实例化仅一次一个模板。
